pos review: Clean. Near the festival. Friendly and helpful staff
neg review: The steps were too thin and dangerous

pos review: Friendly staff, nice rooms. Quite nice for a one night stay.

neg review: It was very hot in the room

pos review: Very close to historic city center, comfortable, clean

An was a fantastic host and gave us tips inc a walking tour of Ghent which we enjoyed greatly.  The beds are comfortable and the room is modern.  Location is ideal for walking into the town centre.  Highly recommended
New hotel. It's clean and close to the centre.

neg review: DON'T GO TO HOTEL CATHEDRAL! Both the bathroom and room are really dirty! Please see the picture of our 'clean' bathroom. I've never seen something like this. For this price you could get a proper hotel instead of a really dirty room.
